name: Color Coded (Meekro)
description:
You have tons of time to yourself, nothing to do, other than stare idly at your screen! Why not play this fun, wacky, addictive game I made called Color Coded!

Color Coded is a simple rhythm game-esque program. To play you must press the arrows shown on the color coded boxes (get it? C;) to gain points against the wishes of the pesky timer!

In all seriousness, this game was meant as a test. I wanted to see what could be done with my 'rather limiting' budget of $0 and a free license to Construct 2. In the future I'm willing to update and work on this game more as a learning exercise if I feel I can learn more from this project and it's continued development is wanted.

Right now, pretty much everything other than than text is a place-holder, I plan to redo many of the sprites with some pixel-art and add music! And fix those weird Creative-Commons sounds! 

Enjoy the game, Weirdos!
